articles.content: OnePlus has been teasing the release of its first smartwatch since 2016, but rumour had it that the Chinese company had shelved its plans indefinitely as of October. Now, OnePlus CEO Pete Lau has off… [+933 chars]

articles.title: 2022 Mercedes-AMG C 43 Wagon Has More Power From a Smaller Package - autoevolution
articles.description: The next generation of the smallest RWD-based Mercedes-Benz sedan is just around the corner, with the C-Class W206 to be officially unveiled sometime in the next few weeks.

articles.title: Among Us Reportedly Had 'Roughly Half a Billion Monthly Active Users in November' - IGN - IGN
articles.description: According to SuperData, Among Us had roughly half a billion active players in November and has become one of the most popular games ever in terms of monthly players.
articles.content: Among Us was allegedly played by roughly half a billion players in November, making it "by far the most popular game ever in terms of monthly players."As reported by SuperData, Among Us' earnings fig… [+1726 chars]
